short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces the New Tab with a custom URL.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unlike most, this extension allows for changing the color of the background before the URL loads. If no color is set, the color will either be black or white, depending on the system preference for dark/light mode.
It also keeps the keyboard focus at the address bar when loading, to make sure written text doesn't get deleted upon loading.
